name: iZi
description:
Founded in 2021 in Vietnam, iZi is a peer-to-peer gamified learning platform offering a new learning experience and instant opportunities where users can create, host and engage with diverse, short, and ?edutainment? content. Powered by user-generated content and diverse, community-driven gamification mechanisms, we aim to disrupt the digital learning behaviors around the globe.

Led by a capable and experienced team in the startup ecosystem, we are open to business opportunities with investors and partners who believe in our journey to become a leading player in the edtech industry.
